content: make your own soft and squishy possum plush with midnight marsupial this no-sew pattern is worked in one piece using cozy blanket yarn and a 6 mm hook quick to make and fun to gift **unique features-** easy-to-follow one-piece pattern detailed photo tutorial included adorable amigurumi design uses super bulky bernat blanket yarn perfect for beginners create a cute possum friend finished size approximately 4 5 x 11 **materials needed-** hook 6mm us size 10 0 yarn blanket super bulky weight 130-135 yards gauge 6 stitches by 5 row = 2 inches in single_crochet **this pattern is available for free on my website which is monetized by ads if you prefer an ad-free version of the pattern it is available to purchase from my pattern shop ** **♥** rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2025 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
